Full name of Sachin Tendulkar is Sachin Ramesh Tendulkar. 

He was born on 24 April 1973. 

His father, Ramesh Tendulkar, was a well-known Marathi novelist and his mother, Rajni, worked in the insurance industry. 

He married with Anjali Mehta, the paediatrician daughter of Gujarati industrialist Anand Mehta, in 1995

Sachin Tendulkar is a former Indian cricketer and captain. 

He took up cricket at the age of eleven. 

He is the only player to have scored one hundred international centuries. 

He is the first batsman to score a double century in a One Day International. 

He is the only player to complete more than 30,000 runs in international cricket.
